entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
